title: Something I Noticed About the New Omega Squad Splash Arts
body:
So the idea behind Omega Squad {{champion:17}} is that his squad perished and he had a mental breakdown, making him a killing machine. So why would we have Omega Squad skins for {{champion:45}}, {{champion:18}}, {{champion:29}}, {{champion:105}}? Aren't they supposed to be dead? (And why are Twitch and Fizz in a yordle-only squad?) Well, take a close look at the splashes if you haven't noticed something before:

https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-M6JvikaNkbs/WWSS3PCufuI/AAAAAAABEb8/FVyx0lzIUeEewFiSGtv0HSUSgla1HTAEQCLcBGAs/s640/fi.jpg

https://cdn.vox-cdn.com/uploads/chorus_asset/file/8832735/omega_squad_twitch.jpg

https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-v0fmmkf8AcA/WWSS3FTuGAI/AAAAAAABEcA/DfQLPSAVHPglI9OPXZ0Tmge-QWJfiNeaACLcBGAs/s640/twst.jpg

https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-vmT9ti3o7gI/WWSS3Tw1r-I/AAAAAAABEcE/TZj8FhmuOYMLvMHAWIdIsft4qxbI1bVsQCLcBGAs/s640/ve.jpg

All these splashes have Teemo (pre-mental breakdown) in them. People have probably figured out that the champions in the Omega Squad skinline (excluding Teemo) are already dead. But this little easter egg shines a bit more light on the lore of Omega Squad.

For those having trouble finding Teemo in the splash arts:
{{champion:105}}: Teemo is riding the shark/dolphin/etc. in a scuba suit on the right of the splash.
{{champion:29}}: Teemo is swinging on a rope in the top-right of the splash in the background.
{{champion:18}}: Teemo is cowering under his helmet in the bottom-left of the splash. (Look under the tip of Tristana's cannon)
{{champion:45}}: Teemo is in the bottom-right of the splash. (Look near the end of Veigar's weapon and the knife nearby)

replies.body:
{{champion:267}} Spooky when long dead threads come back from the grave!

While the art of thread necromancy can be useful in some cases, this unfortunately, is not one of those times. I am putting this poor zombie back gently into that good night. 

RIP thread.
So from what we can gather, these 4 were originally the omega squad, and then they died, followed by Teemo taking up the mantle after breaking?

Teemo didn't like all the hate they gave him.
So he killed them.
By putting mines in their escape route.
You don't mess with satan. As usual.

i think its a fair assumption to also state that there are probably a couple other original members who havent been introduced yet (ziggs, heim) 

i also think these splash arts are faded photographs with the filter and slightly faded edges

edit: another thing is have they ever mentioned this is a yordle only squad? i dont recall so i have no problem with a marine fizz and spec ops twitch ^__^

These skins are flashbacks of Teemos crew before Teemo became Omega Squad Teemo. Look around the border / edges, there's some shading / fading effects.

If Fizz is a Yordle:
-This Omega Squad is a yordle full squad (only twitch isn't)
-Teemo is scared on twitch splashart, he isn't on the others
-These 4 pictures look like old photos, maybe the squad before the all died( as teemo says in a quote)
-"The rat is out of place isn't he? Almost like he doesn't belong...", was twitch a spy or something else that had to mission to kill the squad?

There are many hints that made me suppose that Twitch killed the Omega Squad.

Fizz Splash.  We see his full face, and he's scared shitless.  The only reason he isn't freaking out in Trist's pic is because he's too busy putting his head down, so we can't see his face.  Veigar appears to be backline enough for Tee to watch everything calmly.
ikr

look at the vertical lines on the splashes, like an old picture or a frame from an old movie..
why would all the splashes be separated? usually a skin line has all member in one splash.

these are individual memories of the teemo's friends before they died
Veigars hand... Is that a Metal Gear Reference??? :O

OMG.... guys.. another hint that twitch betrayed the Omega squad is to look at the title of the Missions given out for this event.  There are 5 missions in total to get the final summoner icon.  One mission for each of the omega skin champs.  The teemo mission is called "rookie" telling us that this is all in the past when teemo was barely in the group.  Twitch's mission is called The "Medic". Is that a hint that he doesn't actually heal but kills his teammates?  One more thing. Each of the missions has a quote from the champ. Twitch's quote is "Kill! Kill! Kill them all!"
Did anyone else notice a picture of Alien Invader Heimerdinger? That makes it seem like the Omega Squad was fighting Aliens...
Never let a dirty rat into your squadron.

When you look at twitch's splash art for omega squad, he is holding a bomb almost like he is going to blow up thr omega squad members... Except teemo, who is swinging on the vine to stop him. He does not succeed, likely kills twitch, then becomes a ruthless killing machine.
Anyone want to make a full Omega Squad skin team in remembrance of Teemos fallen comrades? Add me IG

NEW OMEGA SQUAD SKIN LINE LORE

so

so the splashes are actually old photos
notice in every photo Teemo is a recruit

exclude Fizz, Teemo is underwater riding a dolphin

notice how all the photos are calm
and then there is Twitch's

The rat is out of place isn't he? Almost like he doesn't belong...

from Teemo

Im the only one left

so there's another faction
PULSEFIRE is one as they can time and interdimension travel

And one of Omega Squad Teemo's quote is Im only one left

They aren't dead. You're telling me you believe in the word of **Satan** about them being dead?

He probably betrayed them and returned claiming they were all dead to pretend to be heroic, but they all actually survived and are hunting down the traitor.
